Controls.spinner_msg_invalid_number: The input string is not a valid number
Controls.spinner_msg_comparison_failed: The input value must be between {0} and {1}
Controls.msgbox_unsaved_changes: Do you want to save the changes you have made?
Controls.msgbox_unsaved_changes_reload: Are you sure you want to reload and lose the changes you have made?
Controls.label_about_details: Visit the tomb3 Config Tool GitHub page for further information.

footprints.Title: Footprints
footprints.Description: Enables PSX footprints to be displayed.

improved_lasers.Title: Improved lasers
improved_lasers.Description: Enables properly scaled lasers and changes them into semitransparent quads instead of opaque lines.

improved_rain.Title: Improved rain
improved_rain.Description: Enables properly scaled rain; changes it into semitransparent quads instead of opaque lines; and makes the color match PSX.

kayak_mist.Title: Kayak mist
kayak_mist.Description: Restores a broken mist effect on the Kayak.

sophia_rings.Title: Sophia rings
sophia_rings.Description:
Changes how Sophia's rings are displayed.
 - PC: original rings.
 - PSX: clear semitransparent rings like PSX.
 - Improved PC: original PC rings, but with improved texture UVs.

uwdust.Title: Underwater dust
uwdust.Description: Restores the PSX underwater particles effect.

upv_wake.Title: UPV wake
upv_wake.Description: Restores the PSX wake effect on the UPV.

GUI_Scale.Title: GUI scale
GUI_Scale.Description: Changes the scale of in-game elements, such as bars.

INV_Scale.Title: Inventory GUI scale
INV_Scale.Description: Changes the scale of in-inventory elements, such as text boxes.

ammo_counter.Title: Ammo counter
ammo_counter.Description:
Changes how the ammo counter is displayed. Note that selecting PSX bar position will override this setting, enforcing the PSX ammo counter.
 - PC: original PC positions.
 - PSX: PSX ammo counter.

bar_pos.Title: Bar position
bar_pos.Description:
Changes the position of GUI bars.
 - PC: original PC positions.
 - PSX: PSX positions.
 - Improved PC: same as PC, but flips the sprint and air bars.

bar_mode.Title: Bar mode
bar_mode.Description:
Changes the display of GUI bars.
 - PC: original PC bars.
 - PSX: PSX bars.

improved_poison_bar.Title: Improved poison bar
improved_poison_bar.Description: Enables a PSX-like poison bar instead of the original flat yellow bar.

pickup_display.Title: Pickup display
pickup_display.Description: Restores the missing display of items when Lara picks them up.

shadow_mode.Title: Shadow mode
shadow_mode.Description:
Changes how shadows are displayed.
 - PC: original octagon shadow.
 - PSX: PSX circle sprite shadow.

crawl_tilt.Title: Crawl tilt
crawl_tilt.Description: Enables Lara aligning herself with the floor when crawling.

duck_roll.Title: Duck roll
duck_roll.Description: Enables the duck roll action. When ducked, press the Sprint button.

flexible_crawl.Title: Flexible crawl
flexible_crawl.Description: Provides less lag in Lara's crawl moveset and restores the run-to-duck and the sprint-to-duck animations.

flexible_sprint.Title: Flexible sprint
flexible_sprint.Description: Removes the restriction to start a sprint only when the bar is full.

slide_to_run.Title: Slide to run
slide_to_run.Description: Restores the slide-to-run animation. Simply hold forward at the end of sliding a slope.

disable_ckey.Title: Colorkey
disable_ckey.Description: Only turn this option OFF if you encounter the transparency bug on Nvidia cards. It might cause other minor issues.

disable_gamma.Title: Gamma
disable_gamma.Description: Turning OFF this option allows for more accurate RGB output.

dozy.Title: DOZY
dozy.Description:
Enables the fly cheat.
 - Press and hold the D O Z Y keys on your keyboard to fly.
 - Press the walk button to get out of the cheat.

psx_crystal_sfx.Title: PSX crystal SFX
psx_crystal_sfx.Description: Enables the "woosh" PSX SFX when collecting crystals instead of the PC heal SFX.

inv_music_mute.Title: Inventory music muting
inv_music_mute.Description:
Changes the handling of music in the inventory.
 - None: continue to play music at the normal volume.
 - Quiet: continue to play music but at a reduced volume.
 - Full: pause the music while in the inventory.

unwater_music_mute.Title: Underwater music muting
unwater_music_mute.Description:
Changes the handling of music while underwater.
 - None: continue to play music at the normal volume.
 - Quiet: continue to play music but at a reduced volume.
 - Full: pause the music while underwater.
